Description: Papyrus fragment bearing 3 lines of a Coptic text written along the fibres (recto). EA 75363, 75364, 75365, 75366, 75367, 75368, 75369, 75370, 75371, 75372, 75373, 75374, 75375 are mounted together.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380728) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380728)
